Name: Micro Mayhem
About the game: Micro Mayhem is a local multiplayer game where up to 6 players challenge each other using toy cars in various location and different game modes. Free For All: It’s the classic game mode where you have to kill everybody and get the highest score first. Last Car Standing: An all against all where your only goal is to be the last player alive. Team Deathmatch Two teams battle each other until one has been destroyed. Capture the Flag: Team-based combat where you have to steal the enemy flag and bring it to your base. King of the Hill: Conquer and occupy a specific zone of the map to accumulate points. Sport: Play what you love. Sports available are football, basketball and hockey. At the moment we have three selectable vehicles that represent three different play styles: Tank Havoc Muscle Every vehicle has it’s own strength and weakness and two different weapons: a basic attack and a special ability. Environment is a key part of micro mayhem. Each scenario has unique elements that can affect gameplay. There are currently three different locations per game mode: Kitchen Study Playroom Thanks for your Time
